augmentation_techniques.quote: Successful: Horizontal Flip, Vertical Flip, Blur, 360 rotates, RandomBrigtnessContrast, ShiftScaleRotate, HueSaturationValue, CutMix, MixUp, FMix, 25% probability for each of past three augmentations

base_models.quote: SWSL ResNeXt 101 8D, SWSL ResNeXt 50, Efficient Net B4, Efficient Net B4 NS, Inception V4, DenseNet 161

pretrained_checkpoints.quote: We trained 5 folds of SWSL ResNeXt 101 8D... Efficient Net B4 NS

primary_loss.quote: Loss Function - Cross Entropy loss with label smoothing (0.2 smoothing before using knowledge distillation and 0.1 after it)

learning_rate_schedule.quote: scheduler - CosineBatchDecayScheduler with gradual warm up (custom impelementation)

batch_size.quote: Mixed precision training with gradient accumulation (iters_to_accumulate=8) ==> big boost on CV

regularization.quote: Cross Entropy loss with label smoothing (0.2 smoothing before using knowledge distillation and 0.1 after it)... early stopping - 8... Mixed precision training with gradient accumulation (iters_to_accumulate=8)... We did a really soft knowledge distillation

cross_validation.quote: We trained 5 folds of SWSL ResNeXt 101 8D

ensemble_method.quote: 1) Simple Averaging Ensemble... 2) MaxProb Ensemble - Max Probability (or Max Confidence) ensemble allows us to choose the dominating model in the prediction process. In this case, if several models predict different labels, we take the prediction from a model with the biggest confidence

prediction_averaging.quote: We used simple technique for our TTA: average of the default image and horizontally flipped image

libraries.quote: import albumentations as A... from apex import amp

image_size.quote: Progressive image size, start_size=256, final_size=512, size_step=32. Size starts increasing after the warm up stage finishes.

external_data.quote: We used 2019 data with removed duplicates for training... We also used Mendeley Leaves for training. This dataset contains images of other plants.

progressive_resizing.quote: Progressive image size, start_size=256, final_size=512, size_step=32. Size starts increasing after the warm up stage finishes.

mixed_precision.quote: Mixed precision training with gradient accumulation (iters_to_accumulate=8) ==> big boost on CV
